name: The Best Ever Chicken Nuggets
author: Nichole
summary: This recipe has been in our family for years. The only problem with it is that there's never enough. It's great for parties, too.
ingredients: 8  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into small chunks
directions: Heat 1 inch oil to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) in a large skillet or saucepan
Stir together the flour, garlic salt, and pepper in a bowl
Dip the chicken pieces individually into the beaten eggs before pressing into the flour mixture to coat; shake off the excess flour
Place the coated chicken pieces onto a plate until all the chicken has been coated
Cook the chicken in batches in the hot oil until golden brown and no longer pink in the center
